body_html: First time this issue occurred was with the first blog post, so August 11th. There was another bug with this team as well during the application process, their application had showed up under their last year's team name (as they had also applied then). Also at the beginning of the program their daily logs were also going under their last year's team name, I unfortunately don't know the ID, but I think @mkalininait had looked into that issue.

body: First time this issue occurred was with the first blog post, so August 11th. There was another bug with this team as well during the application process, their application had showed up under their last year's team name (as they had also applied then). Also at the beginning of the program their daily logs were also going under their last year's team name, I unfortunately don't know the ID, but I think @mkalininait had looked into that issue.
